io.scanbot.sdk.idcardscanner

Class IdCardScannerFrameHandler

  • io.scanbot.sdk.idcardscanner.IdCardScannerFrameHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FrameHandler

    public class IdCardScannerFrameHandler
implements FrameHandler

    Performs ID card data detection on camera preview frames. Outputs results via interface IdCardScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler.

    Preview frame considered intercepted if at least one interface IdCardScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler returns true from IdCardScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler.handle

    See Also:
    interface IdCardScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler, interface IdCardScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler, IdCardScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler.handle, addResultHandler

    • Field Detail

      • Companion

        public static io.scanbot.sdk.idcardscanner.IdCardScannerFrameHandler.Companion Companion

    • Constructor Detail

      • IdCardScannerFrameHandler

        public IdCardScannerFrameHandler(@NotNull
                                 IdCardScanner idCardScanner,
                                 boolean shouldRecognize)

        Performs ID card data detection on camera preview frames. Outputs results via interface IdCardScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler.

        Preview frame considered intercepted if at least one interface IdCardScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler returns true from IdCardScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler.handle

        Parameters:
        shouldRecognize - whether to recognize field and their data on ID card. Defaults to true
        See Also:
        interface IdCardScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler, interface IdCardScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler, IdCardScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler.handle, addResultHandler

    • Method Detail

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()

        Parameter determines if ID card detection is enabled. In case of false value incoming frames are skipped.

        Default is true

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean p)

        Parameter determines if ID card detection is enabled. In case of false value incoming frames are skipped.

        Default is true

      • handleFrame

        @Synchronized
public boolean handleFrame(@NotNull
                                         io.scanbot.sdk.camera.FrameHandler.Frame previewFrame)

        Invoked for every new camera preview frame

        Parameters:
        previewFrame - captured preview frame data
        Returns:
        true if frame should be considered as "intercepted", i.e. no further processing should be performed on it. false to allow other frame handlers to process this frame.

      • addResultHandler

        public void addResultHandler(@NotNull
                             io.scanbot.sdk.idcardscanner.IdCardScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler resultHandler)

        Registers result handler which will be notified about ID card detection results.

        Results are coming on the worker thread. Don't forget to move execution to main thread before updating UI.

        Parameters:
        resultHandler - handler to register. Must not be null. If handler was alreadyregistered, nothing happens.

      • removeResultHandler

        public void removeResultHandler(@NotNull
                                io.scanbot.sdk.idcardscanner.IdCardScannerFrameHandler.ResultHandler resultHandler)

        Unregisters handler.

        Parameters:
        resultHandler - handler to unregister. If it was not registered before, nothing happens.

      • clearResultHandlers

        public void clearResultHandlers()

        Unregisters all handlers. If nothing was registered before, nothing happens.

      • <no name provided>

        public void <no name provided>()

        Continuously notified about ID card scanner results.

      • attach

        @JvmStatic
 @NotNull
public static IdCardScannerFrameHandler attach(@NotNull
                                                                    IScanbotCameraView cameraView,
                                                                    @NotNull
                                                                    IdCardScanner idCardScanner,
                                                                    boolean shouldRecognize)

        Convenience method for creating new class IdCardScannerFrameHandler and adding it as interface FrameHandler to given camera view.

        Parameters:
        cameraView - cameraView to attach handler to
        idCardScanner - scanner to perform ID card detection
        shouldRecognize - whether to recognize field and their data on ID card. Defaults to true
        See Also:
        class IdCardScannerFrameHandler, interface FrameHandler
